name: One Shot, One Kill (BigFraudBigFraud)
description:
You may only get one kill per shot. If you miss or kill more than one enemy in one shot then you lose!
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2019

***Recommended to play in full screen because the assets didn't scale properly***

WASD to move
Mouse and Left Click to shoot
Right Click to Boost (Only get one, but refills on kill)

Please DM me on Discord or make a comment if you've found any bugs!

Thanks to anyone and everyone who gave me feedback and I would love for any newcomers to give it a shot!
